text:
How to use contains parameter within a crm_object function?
Is this the correct way to do it?
```crm_object("object",'limit=1&myproperty__contains=value1,value2',...)```

Hi Channel, Is there any restriction when using `blog_recent_author_posts` inside dynamic pages (`dynamic_page_hubdb_row`)?
I am using this variable, but it does not render the content inside the dynamic pages. Thanks!
